A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m not sure if I’m mad or just really sad. I’m leaning towards sad. I can’t believe a film is making me feel like this but I really think Rian Johnson destroyed this franchise. I understand that he wanted to “do something different and set up a new direction” but isn’t that what your new trilogy is for? Episode 8 should have stayed on the path that was set up in 7. Give the fans what they want. You literally ripped the heart out of so many people. Me included. I know many are saying they won’t watch the new trilogy or episode 9 but I truly won’t. I’m 40 years old and this awful film destroyed one of the most precious memories of my childhood. I feel so bad for Mark Hamill. Sucking on an alien space titty? WTF was that. So degrading and disrespectful to him and the character that basically defined him as an actor. Watching this movie was so confusing.
